lead_paragraph: By agreeing to sell his company Abraxis BioScience, Patrick Soon-Shiong is adding to a fortune that Forbes values at $4 billion.
snippet: By agreeing to sell his company Abraxis BioScience, Patrick Soon-Shiong is adding to a fortune that Forbes values at $4 billion.

headline.main: Prominent Drug Chief to Sell Abraxis BioScience to Celgene for $2.9 Billion
headline.seo: Celgene to Buy Abraxis BioScience for $2.9 Billion
headline.print_headline: Prominent Drug Chief to Sell Abraxis BioScience to Celgene for $2.9 Billion
